data.text:
@tripperhead Just a reminder that all these people are Gov employees and must be “vaccinated” for a while now. So whose spreading this? Must be the vaccinated, predominantly. But the unvaccinated can’t enter a building, buy food or get their hair cut.
Was never about health.
@tripperhead Classic use of political euphemism here that’s all. They really aren’t drivers or secretaries so it’s baffling quite how they haven’t caught Covid from them 😜
@phish73 @tripperhead That's where that "preliminary" wording still comes in handy.
@tripperhead Director of Marine.... I feel like there's sth missing from this job title.
@tripperhead If he tests positive but the wife tests negative he better pack and go to the camp.
@tripperhead They must be using the famous, cone of silence to protect themselves from others while they "work" on not solving Covid in HK https://t.co/N5DvwsjHZI
@tripperhead Do these folks get sent to isolation camp since close contact??
@tripperhead I assume her driver and helper are negative?
